headline: GTA Online
subtitle: Rewards for Riding the Crime Wave
content:
This week marks your last chance to earn rare rewards as carnage and chaos reign on the streets of Los Santos.

Whether you acquire Gâ€™s Cache awaiting pick-up, storm a Stash House, or complete hand-offs with Street Dealers, taking part in criminal activities is a one-way ticket to rare collectibles, accessories, and clothing, like the Purple X-Ray Emissive Mask.
